attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
SHAVE TONY BLAIR'S HEAD BEFORE HE RESIGNS.
Tony Blair is the Labour Party's longest-serving prime minister, the only person to have led the party to three consecutive general election victories, and the only Labour prime minister to serve more than one full consecutive term.
THEREFORE WE ALL WISH TO SEE HIM GO BALD BEFORE HE LEAVES. (PLEASE TONY SHAVE YOUR HEAD).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
